channel.title: Need Server Help
channel.description: When i run my server i have to use 0.0.0.0 or my own ip address.... when i try to use my ip from ipchicken.com to add to server list it says my server is offline. Can i have some help????? ty i tryed portforward.com and still idk wut to do. ty

item.title: Need Server Help
item.dc:creator: @Dopple1 Dopple™
item.description:
@Dopple1 wrote:

partyharhar:

When i run my server i have to use 0.0.0.0 or my own ip address… when i try to use my ip from ipchicken.com to add to server list it says my server is offline. Can i have some help??? ty i tryed portforward.com and still idk wut to do. ty

Ok get a no-ip.com host.
You gotta port forward or you can not run a server.
Wat router are you using?

Read full topic
